snippet.textDisplay:
China lies since December about this "flu".
WHO lies with China (its second biggest donation contributer)
The West, under the Globalist system, weighs up cost of doing or saying anything preventative.
Coronavirus spreads across the planet.
Inconsistent action across the planet.
14 day incubation false more like 22 days
Asymptomatic but still contagious
Once recovered can cause secondary and more deadly infection
No vaccine
No cure

Does it sound like NHS is prepared for this? The action to prepare should've been stopping all movement between us and anyone who had been to China and banning Chinese nationals. We didn't do it. That window is now slammed shut and the infections begin. We are probably at day 28, China is day 60...let's see what we look like this time next month. Good luck!

snippet.textDisplay:
Let us stop for a little moment in this catastrophic large-scale event of the Coronavirus, and read a little story:

As an old man and a little girl walk by a restricted area out in a street, they both stop to witness a regular scanning procedure for the coronavirus. Special ops members can be seen standing guard on the opposite side of the road, guarding a restricted building. Two civilians (Civilian C and Civilian D) can be seen kneeling on the ground, awaiting their fate. Suddenly, a guard dressed in a hazmat suit violently opens the front door of the building. Two more civilians (Civilian A and Civilian B) are escorted out to join their kneeling fellows.

Guard A opens the door : "Lets go."


Civilian B walks over to the other two kneeling civilians, and kneels on the floor with them in a line .


Civilian A : "You leave me alone."


Guard B, dressed in a hazmat suit, grabs Civilian A : "Down on the ground."


Civilian A : "Okay, okay. Jesus!"


Guard B : "I said get down.", *as Guard A and B hit Civilian A with rifle butts until he drops on his knees *


Civilian A while getting beaten : "I didn't do anything wrong."


Guard B points rifle : "Hands on your f%%%%%g head. Do it." Civilian A obeys


Guard B to Guard A : "Alright, scan 'em."


Guard A brings out hand-sized virus scanner and places it against the back of Civilian A's head


Beep. rrgh rrgh rrgh rrgh Beep Beep. "Clean", Guard A says, as he moves over to Civilian B


Beep. rrgh rrgh rrgh rrgh Beep Beep. "Clean", Guard A says, as he moves over to Civilian C


Beep. rrgh rrgh Beep Beep. "Got a live one.” says Guard A, as Guard B shoves Civilian C to the ground face first .


Civilian C : "No!"


Guard A : "Ah sh*t. Hold her down."


Civilian C : "I'm not infected! It’s wrong! The scan's wrong! Please!" As Guard B restrains her on the floor


*Guard C in the background*: "Hold her down."


Guard A : "Do it." As Guard C, dressed in full special ops gear, walks over and injects a certain type of deadly liquid into Civilian C's neck.
Civilian C squirms and shakes about on the floor while Guard B continues to restrain her, as Civilians A, B and D look in horror


"Eyes forward!" Guard B says as he instructs the other civilians while rising from the ground, pointing his rifle at them


"Alright. She's down." Says Guard C as he walks back to his position Guards A and B move to the last civilian, Civilian D.


"F%k this!" Says Civilian D, as he turns around and smacks Guard A's rifle away from his head while getting up from the ground and attempting a desperate escape.


Guards A and B shoot a single shot each from their rifles, both bullets hitting Civilian D in the back and penetrating out of his chest.


Civilian D falls forward, flat on the ground, dead


"Holy Sh%t, holy sh%t!" Says Civilian B as he looks on in horror


"Shut up", Yells Guard A , "Consider yourself lucky. That's what happens when you hide out in a condemned building.", Says Guard A as he lectures the remaining two civilians A and B.


Upon seeing the entire coronavirus scanning procedure, the old man and the little girl continue walking on minding their own business.
snippet.textOriginal:
*Let us stop for a little moment in this catastrophic large-scale event of the Coronavirus, and read a little story:*

_As an old man and a little girl walk by a restricted area out in a street, they both stop to witness a regular scanning procedure for the coronavirus. Special ops members can be seen standing guard on the opposite side of the road, guarding a restricted building. Two civilians (Civilian C and Civilian D) can be seen kneeling on the ground, awaiting their fate. Suddenly, a guard dressed in a hazmat suit violently opens the front door of the building. Two more civilians (Civilian A and Civilian B) are escorted out to join their kneeling fellows._
 
*Guard A opens the door* : "Lets go." 


*Civilian B walks over to the other two kneeling civilians, and kneels on the floor with them in a line* . 


*Civilian A* : "You leave me alone." 


*Guard B, dressed in a hazmat suit, grabs Civilian A* : "Down on the ground." 


*Civilian A* : "Okay, okay. Jesus!" 


*Guard B* : "I said get down.", *as Guard A and B hit Civilian A with rifle butts until he drops on his knees *


*Civilian A while getting beaten* : "I didn't do anything wrong." 


*Guard B points rifle* : "Hands on your f%%%%%g head. Do it." *Civilian A obeys*


*Guard B to Guard A* : "Alright, scan 'em." 


*Guard A brings out hand-sized virus scanner and places it against the back of Civilian A's head* 


Beep. rrgh rrgh rrgh rrgh Beep Beep. *"Clean", Guard A says, as he moves over to Civilian B*


Beep. rrgh rrgh rrgh rrgh Beep Beep. *"Clean", Guard A says, as he moves over to Civilian C*


Beep. rrgh rrgh Beep Beep. *"Got a live one.” says Guard A, as Guard B shoves Civilian C to the ground face first* . 


*Civilian C* : "No!" 


*Guard A* : "Ah sh*t. Hold her down." 


*Civilian C* : "I'm not infected! It’s wrong! The scan's wrong! Please!" *As Guard B restrains her on the floor*


*Guard C in the background*: "Hold her down." 


*Guard A* : "Do it." *As Guard C, dressed in full special ops gear, walks over and injects a certain type of deadly liquid into Civilian C's neck.*
*Civilian C squirms and shakes about on the floor while Guard B continues to restrain her, as Civilians A, B and D look in horror* 


"Eyes forward!" *Guard B says as he instructs the other civilians while rising from the ground, pointing his rifle at them* 


"Alright. She's down." *Says Guard C as he walks back to his position Guards A and B move to the last civilian, Civilian D.* 


"F%k this!" *Says Civilian D, as he turns around and smacks Guard A's rifle away from his head while getting up from the ground and attempting a desperate escape.* 


*Guards A and B shoot a single shot each from their rifles, both bullets hitting Civilian D in the back and penetrating out of his chest.* 


*Civilian D falls forward, flat on the ground, dead* 


"Holy Sh%t, holy sh%t!" *Says Civilian B as he looks on in horror* 


"Shut up", *Yells Guard A* , "Consider yourself lucky. That's what happens when you hide out in a condemned building.", *Says Guard A as he lectures the remaining two civilians A and B.* 


_Upon seeing the entire coronavirus scanning procedure, the old man and the little girl continue walking on minding their own business._

snippet.textDisplay:
The death rate looks like it’s between 3-5% depending on
medical care. Yes, we have great medical care in the US however if many people
get sick this would overwhelm the hospitals. This fatality rate assumes no cure
or treatment and this assumption may change (hopefully). We have a case study
we can watch which includes all mild, severe and critical. That is the Princess
Diamond passengers (generally older than the regular US population which leans
toward an older population group analysis which should be of some comfort to
younger people) who were ALL tested (this is what I read though this s/b
confirmed) whether they showed symptoms or not. Let's hope that this group is
not an accurate picture of the fatality rate due to maybe a much older
population group (I hope). We know that as of today .5% (5 have died out of the
700 die which is 5 times the flu rate) of these passengers died and 5% need ICU
care (that is 36 out of 700 (go to worldometers.info/coronavirus website)).

In most countries, without excellent medical care, this
would result in a fatality rate of at least 5%. Note that severe cases (not
disclosed in the Princess Diamond data) that do not fall in the ICU category
may also result in deaths if not treated (the answer to this question is not
known at this time as the data is not available - so if you have a severe case
of coronavirus and you need oxygen (though it’s not considered an ICU case) and
do not get it, do you die? - answer is not known).  In China, 60% of those in ICU passed away
(this group included nurses and doctors who were in ICU who died). So, if we
assume the China data is correct (real stretch) then you’re looking at a
fatality rate of 3.5%. If the Chinese data is not correct and we assume the US
medical system is vastly superior to the China medical system, then yes you are
looking at a .4 or.5% fatality rate (assuming none of the ICU patients die).

Also since this coronavirus spreads faster than the flu
(which had 43 million cases in 2018) we are looking at least 43 million
cases here in the U.S. (for all of 2020) unless we quarantine (which we should
consider though summer should help us a lot as this will slow down the spread
of the virus) until we get a cure or vaccine or drugs that mitigate the
illness. Instead of 79k deaths (2018 data) we are looking at 1.5M deaths
(probably a low estimate) assuming a 3.5% fatality rate and assuming the same
population size (which is probably low as this virus is much more contagious
then the flu unless we quarantine). If we keep it down to .5% then you’re
looking at about 215k deaths (probably best-case scenario at this time)
compared to the flu with 79k in deaths (2018 data). My guess is hospitals do
not have the facilities to handle critical cases therefore we should assume
that at least 1.5 million Americans will die unless a drug is found that
mitigates this death rate (such as remdesivir which is currently being tested
and which was reported to work in China) or a vaccine is developed ASAP (many
companies are working on this). You should prepare for the worst and hope for
the best. I am optimistic as I believe we are the greatest country in the
world, and we will find a way to mitigate the fatality rate of this virus
(through drugs or a vaccine).

snippet.textDisplay: If you are a Christian, then these verses are for you, "And I heard another voice from heaven, saying, Come out of her, my people, that ye be not partakers of her sins, and that ye receive not of her plagues. For her sins have reached unto heaven, and God hath remembered her iniquities." If you are not, "Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly, that God hath made that same Jesus, whom ye have crucified, both Lord and Christ. Now when they heard this, they were pricked in their heart, and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles, Men and brethren, what shall we do? 38 Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost. For the promise is unto you, and to your children, and to all that are afar off, even as many as the Lord our God shall call. And with many other words did he testify and exhort, saying, Save yourselves from this untoward generation. Then they that gladly received his word were baptized: and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls."

snippet.textDisplay:
Anyone vaguely interested in finance knows the world was heading into a massive recession like the Great Depression in the 1930s long before Corona Baloney. Governments and Central Banks printing more and more money to bolster the stockmarkets. Major companies borrowing 'free' money to buy their own shares rather than investing. Negative interest rates. The financial collapse would be blamed on the governments and fat cats. What's the answer? Blame it on a new deadly virus called Corona. This enables massive clamp downs and control. Then they can say "We are not to blame." "We are doing our best to help and save you." LOL
Corona Virus:- Fancy name for colds and flu.
